sent.orig: Government is an agreement between you and myself. You and myself are often wrong.
sent.trans: 政府是你和我之间的协定。你和我常常是错误的。

sent.orig: And why should I restrict myself, segregate myself?
sent.trans: 况且我何必限制自己，孤立自己呢？

sent.orig: I'd rather kill myself than reconcile myself to my fate.
sent.trans: 我宁可自杀也不要屈服与命运。

sent.orig: I can't control myself and then, I tell myself, nothing, you just love his wealth. maybe!
sent.trans: 我真的无法控制自己，我告诉自己“没有关系，你或许只是爱他的财富”。

sent.orig: Why do I do myself the injustice of calling myself a girl?
sent.trans: 唉！我怎么啦，自己糟蹋起自己来啦，叫自己是女孩儿家。
